data.name: Ashen Will
data.detailed_description:
A corridor stretching endlessly ahead. A fog creeping at the corners of your vision. A camera, heavy, thick, old, weighing down your hand. And the sound of crying in the distance, growing ever closer

Ashen Will is an atmospheric horror game in which you must traverse a dark, randomly generated maze, taking photos of invisible enemies to grab a precious few seconds before death. Your only tool for hope is your camera, granting you the ability to freeze enemies in place, and mark corridors you've traveled down. But film is finite and precious, and even the best run can still end painfully quickly. We wish you the best of luck...you'll need it
data.about_the_game:
A corridor stretching endlessly ahead. A fog creeping at the corners of your vision. A camera, heavy, thick, old, weighing down your hand. And the sound of crying in the distance, growing ever closer

Ashen Will is an atmospheric horror game in which you must traverse a dark, randomly generated maze, taking photos of invisible enemies to grab a precious few seconds before death. Your only tool for hope is your camera, granting you the ability to freeze enemies in place, and mark corridors you've traveled down. But film is finite and precious, and even the best run can still end painfully quickly. We wish you the best of luck...you'll need it
data.short_description: Trapped, and with enemies closing in, your only chance of survival is to rely on the simple camera you hold. Ashen Will is an atmospheric maze-based horror game, where your options are preciously low. No one is coming to help. No one is coming to save you. Survive.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060
  • Storage: 175 MB available space
